department.dept_long_name: Department of Slavic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Advanced Russian: Reading, Composition, and Conversation
course.meeting_text: M., W., F., at 1, with a speaking section Tu., Th., at 1 or 2. Tuesday/Thursday small group practice times are tentative and will be adjusted to accommodate student schedules.
course.description: Continuing work on vocabulary and grammar centering on verbs and verb government. Readings include works by Chekhov and Dostoevsky, poetry, and film.
course.prerequisites: Russian 101 or placement at the 103 level.
course.notes: Strongly recommended for students who plan to continue in Russian.
